message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"with; to follow; together with","sentence":"你跟我来。","image_prompt":"Two simple cartoon figures, one leading and one following close behind, in a soft apocalypse animation style. The leader gestures with a hand, the follower looks attentive, both walking forward in a slightly desolate but gentle landscape. Muted pastel colors, crumbling city elements in the background but the characters are friendly and clear.","sentence_translation":"You come with me."}
